headline: What's Going On With Marvell Technology Stock On Wednesday?
summary: Marvell Technology, Inc (NASDAQ:MRVL) on Wednesday announced the successful interoperability of the Marvell Structera portfolio of Compute Express Link (CXL) devices with Advanced Micro Devices, Inc (NASDAQ:AMD) EPYC CPUs and 5th Gen Intel Corp (NASDAQ:INTC) Intel Xeon platforms. The move marks Marvellâ€™s progress towards an open and interoperable CXL ecosystem, which will address the growing demands for memory bandwidth and capacity in next-generation cloud data centers.
